metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9798 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: On Android systems, Firefox can load a library from APITRACE_LIB, which is writable by all users and applications. This could allow malicious third party applications to execute a man-in-the-middle attack if a malicious code was written to that location and loaded. *Note: This issue only affects Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 66.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine seth-arnold> Only affects Windows

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
